entry.title: Armenia expects EU to extend civilian mission presence

media:group.media:title: Armenia expects EU to extend civilian mission presence
media:group.media:description:
üìç Nikol Pashinyan and Ilham Aliyev held a rare bilateral meeting in Kazan, Russia, where BRICS is holding a summit. üìç The European Union is considering extending its civilian mission to Armenia, the country‚Äôs foreign minister, Ararat Mirzoyan, said during a Q&A session in parliament. üìç Former U.S. President and current presidential candidate Donald Trump claimed that he would establish peace between Armenia and Azerbaijan if elected. üìç Armenia‚Äôs Gyumri dry port project in limbo as negotiations continue: civilnet.am/en/news/802294/armenias-gyumri-dry-port-project-in-limbo-as-negotiations-continue/ üìç Breast cancer numbers rise among young women in Armenia as detection improves: civilnet.am/en/news/802268/breast-cancer-cases-rise-among-young-women-in-armenia-as-detection-improves/

entry.title: The Art of Animation: Conversation With Aaron Blaise

media:group.media:title: The Art of Animation: Conversation With Aaron Blaise
media:group.media:description:
Renowned animator Aaron Blaise shares his thoughts on the importance of stepping out of your studio as an animator and interacting with the real world through travel, cross-cultural exchange and experiences in nature. As a key figure behind beloved Disney classics like The Lion King and Brother Bear, Aaron emphasizes the power of storytelling and how artists can use new opportunities to share their culture, history and stories with a wider audience. Aaron also reflects on his experience in Armenia and the chance to explore the country‚Äôs growing creative scene.

entry.title: Systemic failures in Armenia's armed forces

media:group.media:title: Systemic failures in Armenia's armed forces
media:group.media:description:
In this week‚Äôs episode of Insights, host Eric Hacopian dissects three critical developments shaping Armenia's security landscape: the newly announced defense spending increase, the controversy surrounding non-combat military deaths, and Russia's withdrawal from the Iranian border checkpoint following the CIS summit in Moscow. This episode offers insights into the challenges facing Armenia's military institutions and the shifting regional dynamics affecting the country's security architecture.

entry.title: European Parliament members call for termination of gas deal with Baku

media:group.media:title: European Parliament members call for termination of gas deal with Baku
media:group.media:description:
üìç Members of the European Parliament condemned Azerbaijan‚Äôs repressive policies, calling to end the gas deal between Baku and the European Union. üìç Armenia has provided asylum to a Belarusian national who is wanted in his home country on charges that are likely politically motivated. üìç Armenia will establish an elite unit within the national police, namely the Police Guard, with authority to use riot control weapons during martial law. üìç What motivates Armenians to call for a referendum on joining the EU: civilnet.am/en/news/802079/what-motivates-armenians-to-call-for-a-referendum-on-joining-the-eu/
